scripts.deploy:live: npm run build && aws s3 sync dist/s3://demo-app.test.com --delete && npm run-script invalidate-cache:live
scripts.invalidate-cache:live: aws configure set preview.cloudfront true && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id <CLOUDFRONT_DISTRIBUTION_ID> --paths '/*'
scripts.release: git fetch --tags && git add CHANGELOG.md && standard-version -a
scripts.release:first: git fetch --tags && git add CHANGELOG.md && standard-version -a --first-release
